introText.title: Welcome to SparkHome! üëè
introText.firstPara: It's a browser homepage that aims for simplicity and efficiency, while maintaining beauty and functionality.
introText.secondPara: You can try typing anything you want to know into the search box. Or maybe... before you hit enter, you'll already get the answer to your question.
introText.thirdPara: Now, click the button below to get started. Just click on the searchbox or hit the space bar to get ready to search.
introText.fourthPara: Of course, there are many more features waiting for you to explore!
